subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mike Nugent made 24 of 27 field goals last season, the most accurate campaign in Jets history since 1990, when Pat Leahy hit 23 of 26.
snippet: Mike Nugent made 24 of 27 field goals last season, the most accurate campaign in Jets history since 1990, when Pat Leahy hit 23 of 26.
